channel.title: Major Digest - Reliable and Comprehensive News Sources: sports
channel.description: Get the latest news online at Major Digest, the top online news resource for the most reliable news sources. Stay informed about the world around you!

image.title: Major Digest - Reliable and Comprehensive News Sources: sports

item.title: FIFA suspends Spain soccer federation president Luis Rubiales for 90 days after World Cup win kiss
item.description: GENEVA (AP) — FIFA suspended Spanish soccer federation president Luis Rubiales on Saturday while its disciplinary committee investigates his conduct at the Women’s World Cup final, which included kissing player Jenni Hermoso on the lips after Spain's victory.
item.dc:creator: GRAHAM DUNBAR and JOSEPH WILSON, Associated Press, KGET 17, NBC
